choose.when: SELECT DISTINCT T2.xn,T2.xq,T2.COURSE_CODE,T2.COURSE_name ,(case when pj.code is not null then 1 else 2 end) isPj, pj_suggest FROM SYS_DATA_XSXK T1 LEFT JOIN SYS_DATA_XS xs on XS.USER_ID = T1.USER_ID LEFT JOIN SYS_DATA_KC T2 ON T2.COURSE_CODE = T1.COURSE_CODE and T2.xn = T1.xn and T2.xq = T1.xq and (t2.skbj_code = t1.bh or t2.skbj_code is null) LEFT JOIN jxpj_xspj_dfpj pj on pj.xn = T2.xn and pj.xq = T2.xq and pj.COURSE_CODE = T2.COURSE_CODE /*and pj.SKJS_CODE = T2.SKJS_CODE*/ and pj.user_id = T1.USER_ID WHERE T1.USER_ID = #{userId}
choose.otherwise:
SELECT DISTINCT T2.xn,T2.xq,T2.COURSE_CODE,T2.COURSE_name ,(case when pj.COURSE_CODE is not null then 1 else 2 end) isPj FROM SYS_DATA_JSRK T1 LEFT JOIN SYS_DATA_KC T2 on T2.SKJS_CODE = T1.USER_ID AND T2.COURSE_CODE = T1.COURSE_CODE and T2.XN = T1.XN AND T2.XQ = T1.XQ LEFT JOIN JXPJ_XSPJ_DFPJ pj on pj.xn = T2.xn and pj.xq = T2.xq and pj.COURSE_CODE = T2.COURSE_CODE where 1=1
and T1.USER_ID = #{userId}

select.if: /*课程名称*/ and T2.COURSE_NAME like concat(concat('%',#{courseName}),'%')

mapper.insert: insert into JXPJ_XSPJ_DFPJ (CODE, XN, XQ, COURSE_CODE, SKJS_CODE, PJ_SUGGEST, USER_ID, USER_NAME, CREATE_DATE) values (#{code},#{xn},#{xq},#{courseCode},#{skjsCode},#{pjSuggest},#{userId},#{userName},CURRENT_DATE)

insert all
into JXPJ_XSPJ_DFPJ_ITEM (RELATION_CODE, TEMPLATE_CODE, TARGET_CODE, SELECTED) VALUES(#{xspj.code},#{xspj.templateCode},#{key,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{val,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
select 1 from dual
mapper.select: select count(distinct code) as "pjNum" ,nvl(sum(case SELECTED when '非常同意' then target_score when '比较同意' then target_score*0.8 when '一般' then target_score*0.6 when '不太同意' then target_score*0.4 when '不同意' then target_score*0.2 else 0 end)/count(distinct code),0) as "totalAvgScore" from jxpj_xspj_dfpj pj left join jxpj_xspj_dfpj_item it on it.relation_code = pj.code left join jxpj_pjset_template_target tt on tt.template_code = it.template_code and tt.target_code = it.target_code left join jxpj_pjset_target tg on tg.target_code = tt.target_code where xn = #{xn} and xq = #{xq} and course_code = #{courseCode}

SELECT T2.COURSE_CODE as "courseCode", T2.COURSE_NAME as "courseName", T2.SKJS_CODE as "skjsCode", T2.SKJS_NAME as "skjsName" FROM SYS_DATA_XSXK T1 LEFT JOIN SYS_DATA_KC T2 ON T2.COURSE_CODE = T1.COURSE_CODE and T2.XN = T1.XN and T2.XQ = T1.XQ LEFT JOIN SYS_DATA_XNXQ t3 on t3.XN = T1.XN and t3.XQ = T1.XQ WHERE CURRENT_DATE BETWEEN begin_date and end_date and T1.USER_ID = #{userId}
mapper.insert: insert into JXPJ_XSPJ_BJPJ (CODE, BEST_TEACHER, USER_ID, USER_NAME, CREATE_DATE) values (#{code},#{bestTeacher},#{userId},#{userName},current_date)

insert all
INTO JXPJ_XSPJ_BJPJ_SCORE (RELATION_CODE, TEMPLATE_CODE, TARGET_CODE, SCORE) VALUES (#{obj.relationCode},#{obj.templateCode},#{obj.targetCode},#{obj.score})
select 1 from dual
insert into JXPJ_XSPJ_BJPJ_SUGGEST (RELATION_CODE, COURSE_CODE, SUGGEST) values (#{relationCode},#{courseCode},NVL(#{suggest}, '无建议或意见') )
mapper.delete: delete from JXPJ_XSPJ_BJPJ_SUGGEST where RELATION_CODE = #{relationCode} and COURSE_CODE = #{courseCode}

choose.when: SELECT c.course_code,c.course_name,c.course_attr,c.XF,c.XS,c.ZY_NAME,c.XY_NAME ,(case when pj.COURSE_CODE is not null then 1 else 2 end) isPj FROM SYS_DATA_JSRK dtc LEFT JOIN SYS_DATA_KC c on c.COURSE_CODE = DTC.COURSE_CODE LEFT JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT course_code FROM ( SELECT TEMPLATE_CODE FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM rn, TEMPLATE_CODE FROM JXPJ_PJSET_TEMPLATE where TEMPLATE_TYPE = '学生评教' ORDER BY END_DATE desc ) where rn = 1 ) t LEFT JOIN JXPJ_XSPJ_BJPJ t1 on t1.TEMPLATE_CODE = t.TEMPLATE_CODE LEFT JOIN JXPJ_XSPJ_BJPJ_SUGGEST t2 on t2.relation_code = t1.code where t2.relation_code is not null ) pj on pj.COURSE_CODE = c.COURSE_CODE where dtc.USER_ID = #{userId}
choose.otherwise: SELECT c.course_code "courseCode",c.course_name "courseName",c.course_attr "courseAttr",c.xf,c.xs,c.ZY_NAME "majorName",c.XY_NAME "collegeName" FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT course_code FROM ( SELECT TEMPLATE_CODE FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM rn, TEMPLATE_CODE FROM JXPJ_PJSET_TEMPLATE where TEMPLATE_TYPE = '学生评教' ORDER BY END_DATE desc ) where rn = 1 ) t LEFT JOIN JXPJ_XSPJ_BJPJ t1 on t1.TEMPLATE_CODE = t.TEMPLATE_CODE LEFT JOIN JXPJ_XSPJ_BJPJ_SUGGEST t2 on t2.relation_code = t1.code where t2.relation_code is not null ) pj LEFT JOIN SYS_DATA_KC c on c.COURSE_CODE = pj.COURSE_CODE

mapper.select: SELECT pj.template_code,pj.TARGET_CODE,target_content,target_score,avg(score) avg_score FROM( SELECT TT.*,target_content,target_score FROM ( SELECT TEMPLATE_CODE FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM rn, TEMPLATE_CODE FROM JXPJ_PJSET_TEMPLATE where TEMPLATE_TYPE = '学生评教' ORDER BY END_DATE desc ) where rn = 1 ) t LEFT JOIN JXPJ_PJSET_TEMPLATE_TARGET tt on TT.TEMPLATE_CODE = t.TEMPLATE_CODE LEFT JOIN JXPJ_PJSET_TARGET tg on tg.target_code = tt.target_code ) t2 LEFT JOIN ( select template_code,target_code,score FROM JXPJ_XSPJ_BJPJ t1 LEFT JOIN JXPJ_XSPJ_BJPJ_TARGET t2 on t2.relation_code = t1.code where course_code = #{courseCode} ) pj on PJ.TEMPLATE_CODE = t2.TEMPLATE_CODE and pj.target_code = t2.target_code GROUP BY pj.template_code,pj.TARGET_CODE,target_content,target_score
SELECT suggest FROM JXPJ_XSPJ_BJPJ t1 LEFT JOIN JXPJ_XSPJ_BJPJ_SUGGEST t2 on t2.relation_code = t1.code where t1.TEMPLATE_CODE = #{templateCode} and t2.COURSE_CODE = #{courseCode}
